Title: Jayalalithaa announces Rs.64 cr. special scheme for Samba crop
Content: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Friday said her government would implement Rs 64.30 crore combined scheme for direct sowing of Samba crop in the delta region if the Mettur dam could no
